mapper.select: select * from t_fil_awbinfo where stockTypeId = #{stockTypeId} and stockPre = #{stockPre}
mapper.update: update t_fil_awbInfo set productId = #{productId}, cargoNm = #{cargoNm}, crtOpeTime = sysdate where stockTypeId = #{stockTypeId} and stockPre = #{stockPre} and stockNo = #{stockNo}
